title: . . . AND HAVE A HAPPY NEW YEAR!

text.text: The end of the year, as we turn the page on 2024, I hope you have a {b}HAPPY NEW YEAR!{/b} Be safe, drink responsibly and if your out get home safe! Also if you havent seen it the lit version of 2D Side Scroller {a=https://the-real-sauce.itch.io/2d-side-scrolling-in-renpy-lite}(   HERE   ){/a}, Also keep an eye out on future projects AND the pro version of 2D Side Scroller thats right around the corner this new year.
